text:
is a Japanese professional football club in Kawasaki, which is south of Tokyo in Kanagawa Prefecture.
In 2012, Yahiro Kazama was named coach.
History.
The club was founded in 1955.
Notable achievement.
The team has some notable achievements.
In 2010, Juninho (Carlos Alberto Carvalho dos Anjos Junior) made three goals in one game against Shonan Bellmare; and Jumpei Kusukami scored three times in a game against Gamba Osaka.
In 2009, Renatinho (Renato Carlos Martins Júnior) kicked three goals in a game against JEF United Ichihara Chiba.
